  • Sample Programs

    sum_test.asm

    Declare number and sum. 

                
.data
    number DW -105
    sum DW ?

    Store first number to EAX

    Add 158 to value in EAX

    Store total to sum 

                
.text
    mov eax, number		
    add eax, 158	
    mov sum, eax
